data.text:
Unlock your productivity by immersing yourself in spaces crafted to inspire and energise. A thoughtfully designed environment can boost your creativity and focus, transforming your workday. Find the perfect space that suits your needs üåø‚ú® Hotel Pullman Berlin Schweizerhof: Dive into a vibrant space where playful design and innovative lighting spark creativity. Pullman Jakarta Central Park: Discover an industrial-chic design that blends art and functionality, perfect for both work and relaxation. Pullman Adelaide: Recharge in the Executive Lounge by Woods Bagot, where a tranquil yet dynamic setting helps you transition seamlessly between focus and relaxation. Discover more on www.pullman.accor.com

Spotlight on Senegal: Art Meets Purpose at Pullman Dakar Teranga PULLMAN DAKAR TERANGA stepped into the vibrant world of Senegalese art through a dynamic partnership with Black Rock Senegal, a renowned artist-in-residence program. This collaboration wasn't just about showcasing artistry; it was about enriching Dakar's cultural tapestry. Black Rock Senegal hosted a series of events featuring their talented alumni, fostering a space for creative exchange and community. From captivating live performances to inspiring artist talks, the energy was electric. We‚Äôre incredibly proud of the Pullman Dakar Teranga team to be a part of this celebration, solidifying the hotel's role as a cultural hub in Dakar.

Pleased to introduce the remarkable talent of Zohra Opoku, a distinguished artist blending German and Ghanaian heritage. Her captivating textile art, currently gracing the lobby at PULLMAN DAKAR TERANGA, marks an exciting collaboration with Black Rock Senegal. Through her artwork, Zohra explores themes of sustainability, personal narrative, and cultural heritage, offering a profound glimpse into Ghana's diverse history. It serves as a gentle reminder of the importance of preserving our collective heritage and cherishing our natural world. Join us in honoring the power of creativity and collaboration with PULLMAN DAKAR TERANGA and Black Rock Senegal.

Explore the charm of KASA at üìçPullman Tokyo Tamachi, where Chef Koji Fukuda crafts a distinct culinary style, blending global flavors with Japanese influences. Experience "KASA" as it infuses the spirit of Kabuki's "Sukeroku" into its design. Whether in the lively open kitchen, cozy private rooms, or pet-friendly terrace seating, each setting offers a tailored dining experience just for you.

Seeking your next destination? Delight in diverse atmospheres that transform throughout the day, offering everything from a refined business lunch to an exciting evening with friends. üéâ Experience Vibrant Events: With 14 adaptable meeting spaces accommodating 15 to 600 attendees in an auditorium format, our convention center stands as one of the region's largest. Tailor your event with customizable options and energize dynamic conversations. Explore more: http://spkl.io/6044400tI

Exploring Lyon? Here are three reasons to choose Pullman Lyon for your next destination: üåø Tranquil Design Oasis: Crafted by architect Fabien Roque, our hotel is designed as an "island of plants," providing an oasis of tranquility amidst the urban landscape. üçΩÔ∏è Culinary Fusion Haven: Discover Pampa Restaurant, offering a fusion of flavors and design, delight in innovative dishes crafted from specially selected ingredients, creating a borderless dining experience. üåê Hyper-Connected Hub: Positioned opposite the Part-Dieu train station and near the To-Lyon tower, Pullman Lyon caters to hyper-connected travelers. Featuring spacious rooms, vibrant courtyard, and a 1000 m¬≤ event space, whether for work or leisure, we offer a flexible space to suit your needs. Welcome to a new setting in the heart of Lyon. PULLMAN Lyon

Spotlight on Te Arikinui Pullman Hotel, Auckland - where tradition and contemporary converge. Crafted by the talented architects at Warren and Mahoney, this architectural marvel pays homage to the iwi of Tainui waka, seamlessly blending MƒÅori-inspired designs into every corner. Te Kaahu, our main restaurant led by Head Chef Nancye Pirini, adds an extra layer of sophistication with a contemporary twist on New Zealand cuisine. Our menu boasts high-quality, locally sourced ingredients, exemplifying the harmonious fusion of tradition and modernity. Explore how we redefine luxury in a unique Kiwi setting. üëâ https://lnkd.in/gHQ9QKtm

Be the first one to explore Ras Al Khaimah as never before - the first man-made archipelago with scenic views of the shimmering waters of the Arabian Gulf. Welcome to the all-new Pullman Resort Al Marjan Island. Whether it's engaging in adrenaline-pumping activities like dune bashing, or simply immersing in the tranquility of the Hajar mountains, make a one-of-a-kind experience part of your daily routine. Embark on this thrilling adventure with us üëâ http://spkl.io/60434IQyF
